email2.subject: HippoAI Beta Testing Confirmation
email2.body:
Hello {{name}},

Your HippoAI Beta Testing week is confirmed to take place from {{start_date}}. 

We will send out details closer to this date, including booking for a virtual onboarding Zoom call/demo the week prior. 

Thank you again for participating. Please reach out at any point. 

The Pendium Health Team
